control.name: backColorEdit
control.description: Specifies the beak form's background color.

control.name: borderColorEdit
control.description: Specifies the beak form's border color.

control.name: ceCloseOnOuterClick
control.description: Specifies whether the beak form closes on light dismiss.

control.name: ceShowButtonPanel
control.description: Specifies whether the built-in button panel is displayed in the FlyoutPanel.

control.name: cbeButtonPanelLocation
control.description: Specifies the location of the built-in button panel in the FlyoutPanel.

control.name: cbeButtonPanelAlignment
control.description: Specifies the alignment of buttons within the button panel.

control.name: btnAddButton
control.description: Provides access to the collection of buttons displayed in the FlyoutPanel's built-in button panel.

control.name: btnRemoveButton
control.description: Provides access to the collection of buttons displayed in the FlyoutPanel's built-in button panel.

control.name: cbeBeakLocation
control.description: Specifies the beak form's location relative to the owner control.
